page.title: 07Nuclear Arms
page.content: A few of us have the fear of waking up next day and to hear the four minute warning. This is the time it takes before a nuclear missile hits us and we would die. In Pocklington we would have a slow and painful death as only the radiation would reach us. CND is a group of people who think nuclear arms should be banned because they endanger our lives and the next generations. They demonstrate outside the targets that would be hit in a nuclear war for example Fylingdales on the North Yorkshire Moors. If there was a World War Three there would not be a lot left. Nearly everyone would be killed and if anyone did survive the Earth would have great craters like the Moon, where the nuclear arms would hit. America is now planning to shoot down missiles in midair with lasers.
